sqlMap.select: SELECT ofc_eng_nm ,ofc_cd ,trf_cur_cd FROM tb_ofc WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND ofc_cd = #ofc_cd#

/* selectCMM_POP_0050_LIST */ SELECT ofc_eng_nm, ofc_cd, prnt_ofc_cd, UPPER(cnt_cd) AS cnt_cd, dbo.fc_ofc_depth(ofc_cd) AS ofc_depth FROM tb_ofc WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND use_flg = 'Y'
AND OFC_CD LIKE ISNULL((SELECT CASE ISNULL(MAX(A.USE_FLG), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '' ELSE MAX(B.OFC_CD) END FROM TB_ROLE_FNC A, TB_USR B WHERE A.ROLE_CD = B.ROLE_CD /* OTHER OFFICE ACCESS (B/L) 권한 조회 */
AND ROLE_FNC_CD = 'O01'
/* OTHER OFFICE ACCESS (ACCT) 권한 조회 */
AND ROLE_FNC_CD = 'O03'
AND B.USRID = #usrid# ), '') + '%'
ORDER BY dbo.fc_ofc_rank(ofc_cd)

SELECT COUNT(ofc_cd) FROM tb_ofc WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND use_flg = 'Y'
AND OFC_CD LIKE (SELECT CASE ISNULL(MAX(A.USE_FLG), 'N') WHEN 'Y' THEN '' ELSE MAX(B.OFC_CD) END FROM TB_ROLE_FNC A, TB_USR B WHERE A.ROLE_CD = B.ROLE_CD AND ROLE_FNC_CD = 'O01' AND B.USRID = #usrid# ) + '%'

SELECT a.ofc_cd, a.ofc_eng_nm, a.ofc_addr, b.cnt_eng_nm FROM tb_ofc a, tb_cnt b WHERE a.cnt_cd = b.cnt_cd AND a.delt_flg = 'N' AND b.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.prnt_ofc_cd IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(a.prnt_ofc_cd) FROM tb_ofc a, tb_cnt b WHERE a.cnt_cd = b.cnt_cd AND a.delt_flg = 'N' AND b.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.prnt_ofc_cd IS NOT NULL

SELECT TOP $topCnt$ a.ofc_cd, a.cnt_cd, b.cnt_locl_nm AS cnt_nm, a.ofc_eng_nm, a.ofc_zip, a.ofc_addr, a.ofc_phn, a.ofc_fax, a.use_flg, a.trdp_cd, g.locl_nm AS trdp_nm, a.prnt_ofc_cd, c.ofc_eng_nm AS prnt_ofc_nm, a.loc_cd, d.loc_nm AS loc_nm, a.descr, a.sls_ofc_cd, e.ofc_eng_nm AS sls_ofc_nm, a.finc_ofc_cd, f.ofc_eng_nm AS finc_ofc_nm, a.trf_cur_cd, a.rgst_usrid, a.rgst_ofc_cd, a.rgst_tms, a.modi_usrid, a.modi_ofc_cd, a.modi_tms, a.delt_flg FROM tb_ofc a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cnt b ON a.cnt_cd = b.cnt_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ofc c ON a.prnt_ofc_cd = c.ofc_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_loc d ON a.loc_cd = d.loc_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ofc e ON a.sls_ofc_cd = e.ofc_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ofc f ON a.finc_ofc_cd = f.ofc_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp g ON a.trdp_cd = g.trdp_cd WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.ofc_eng_nm LIKE '%'+#s_ofc_eng_nm#+'%'
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#
AND a.cnt_cd = #s_cnt_cd#
AND a.loc_cd = #s_loc_cd#
ORDER BY a.ofc_cd ASC

SELECT COUNT(loc_cd) FROM tb_ofc a WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.ofc_eng_nm LIKE '%'+#s_ofc_eng_nm#+'%'
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#
AND a.cnt_cd = #s_cnt_cd#
AND a.loc_cd = #s_loc_cd#
SELECT rmk.rmk_cd, rmk.rmk_title, rmk.rmk_detail, rmk.dft_flg FROM tb_bl_rmk rmk WHERE rmk.ofc_cd = #s_ofc_cd# AND rmk.use_flg = 'Y' order by dft_flg desc, rmk_cd asc

SELECT a.rmk_cd, a.rmk_title, a.rmk_detail, a.dft_flg, a.ofc_cd as s_ofc_cd FROM tb_bl_rmk a WHERE a.use_flg = 'Y'
AND a.ofc_cd = #s_ofc_cd#
AND a.rmk_cd = #rmk_cd#
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(rmk_cd),0)+1 pk FROM tb_bl_rmk WHERE OFC_CD = #s_ofc_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_bl_rmk ( RMK_CD, OFC_CD, RMK_TITLE, RMK_DETAIL, DFT_FLG, USE_FLG, RGST_USRID, MODI_USRID ) VALUES ( #rmk_cd#, #ofc_cd#, #rmk_title#, #rmk_detail#, #dft_flg#, 'Y', #rmk_usr_id#, #rmk_usr_id# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_bl_rmk SET RMK_TITLE = #rmk_title#, RMK_DETAIL = #rmk_detail#, DFT_FLG = #dft_flg#, MODI_USRID = #rmk_usr_id#, MODI_TMS = GETUTCDATE() WHERE OFC_CD = #ofc_cd# and rmk_cd = #rmk_cd#
UPDATE tb_bl_rmk SET DFT_FLG = 'N', MODI_USRID = #rmk_usr_id#, MODI_TMS = GETUTCDATE() WHERE OFC_CD = #ofc_cd# and rmk_cd != #rmk_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_OFC_SETTINGS ( OFC_CD, SET_TYPE, VALUE_1, VALUE_2, RGST_USRID, MODI_USRID ) VALUES ( #i_ofc_cd#, #set_type#, #value1#, #value2#, #rgst_usrid#, #modi_usrid# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_OFC_SETTINGS SET VALUE_1 = #value1#, VALUE_2 = #value2#, MODI_USRID = #modi_usrid#, MODI_TMS = GETUTCDATE() WHERE OFC_CD = #i_ofc_cd# and SET_TYPE = #set_type#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE OFC_CD = #i_ofc_cd# and SET_TYPE = #set_type#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_OFC ( OFC_CD, CNT_CD, OFC_ENG_NM, OFC_ZIP, OFC_ADDR, OFC_PHN, OFC_FAX, TRDP_CD, PRNT_OFC_CD, LOC_CD, DESCR, USE_FLG, FINC_OFC_CD, SLS_OFC_CD, RGST_USRID, RGST_OFC_CD, RGST_TMS, MODI_USRID, MODI_OFC_CD, MODI_TMS, DELT_FLG, TRF_CUR_CD, STATE_CD, OFC_LOCL_NM, OFC_EMAIL, OFC_URL, IATA_CD, FMC_NO, TAX_TYPE, TAX_NO,

GL_AR, GL_AP, GL_AGENT_AR, GL_AGENT_AP, GL_AGENT_OTH, GL_AGENT_OI, GL_AGENT_OE, GL_AGENT_AI, GL_AGENT_AE, GL_RE_EARN, GL_EX_PROFIT, GL_EX_LOSS, GL_MISC_PROFIT, GL_MISC_LOSS, GL_AGENT_PS_OI, GL_AGENT_PS_OE, GL_AGENT_PS_AI, GL_AGENT_PS_AE, GL_AGENT_PS_OTH, GL_VAT_REV, GL_VAT_COST, GL_VAT_EXP,
INV_RMK, INV_FONT_SIZE, INV_CARR_RMK, INV_CARR_FONT_SIZE, CRDR_RMK, CRDR_FONT_SIZE, LOCL_STMT_RMK, LOCL_STMT_FONT_SIZE, AGENT_STMT_RMK, AGENT_STMT_FONT_SIZE, DO_RMK, DO_FONT_SIZE, OOH_BKG_RMK, OOH_BKG_FONT_SIZE, AWB_RMK, AWB_FONT_SIZE, PKUP_RMK, PKUP_FONT_SIZE, QUO_RMK, QUO_FONT_SIZE, OI_QUO_RMK, OI_QUO_FONT_SIZE, OE_QUO_RMK, OE_QUO_FONT_SIZE, AI_QUO_RMK, AI_QUO_FONT_SIZE, AE_QUO_RMK, AE_QUO_FONT_SIZE, WH_RCT_RMK, WH_RCT_FONT_SIZE, OI_AN_RMK, OI_AN_FONT_SIZE, OI_AN_LCL_DESC, OI_AN_FCL_DESC, SEA_BODY, SEA_LCL_DESC, SEA_FCL_DESC, SEA_COB, SEA_MEI, SEA_MSCO, VSL_SHOW_FLG, LOAD_PORT_SHOW_FLG, CNTR_40HQ_DESC, CNTR_45_DESC, AI_AN_RMK, AI_AN_FONT_SIZE, AIR_BODY, AEM_HAND_INFO, AEH_HAND_INFO,
DFLT_AN_MEMO, DOCK_RCPT_RMK, EMAIL_SIGN,
OPER1_FLG, OPER2_FLG, OPER3_FLG, OPER4_FLG, OPER5_FLG, OPER6_FLG, OPER7_FLG, OPER8_FLG, OPER9_FLG, ACC1_FLG, ACC2_FLG, ACC3_FLG, ACC4_FLG, ACC5_FLG, ACC6_FLG, ACC7_FLG, ACC8_FLG, ACC9_FLG, POST_DT_EXP, POST_DT_IMP, POST_DT_INV, POST_DT_CRDR, PPS_USE_FLG, PPS_PAYTO_TRDP_CD, PPS_CNTR20_RT, PPS_CNTR40_RT, PPS_CBM_RT, OFC_REP_NM, CCN_PRFX, OI_CCN_SEQNO, AI_CCN_SEQNO, TSA_SEC_NO, RVN_BANK_SEQ, COST_BANK_SEQ, USE_HBL_SER, OI_CGOR_PIC_INFO, AI_CGOR_PIC_INFO, WM_DOC_PRFX, WM_DOC_SEQ_NO, CTF_USE_FLG, CTF_PAYTO_TRDP_CD, CTF_CNTR20_RT, CTF_CNTR40_RT, CTF_CBM_RT, CF_USE_FLG, CF_PAYTO_TRDP_CD, CF_CNTR20_RT, CF_CNTR40_RT, CF_CBM_RT
) VALUES( #i_ofc_cd#, #i_cnt_cd#, #i_ofc_eng_nm#, #i_ofc_zip#, #i_ofc_addr#, #i_ofc_phn#, #i_ofc_fax#, #i_trdp_cd#, #i_prnt_ofc_cd#, #i_loc_cd#, #i_descr#, #i_use_flg#, #i_finc_ofc_cd#, #i_sls_ofc_cd#, #i_rgst_usrid#, #i_rgst_ofc_cd#, GETDATE(), #i_modi_usrid#, #i_modi_ofc_cd#, GETUTCDATE(), #i_delt_flg#, #i_trf_cur_cd#, #i_state_cd#, #i_ofc_locl_nm#, #i_ofc_email#, #i_ofc_url#, #i_iata_cd#, #i_fmc_no#, #i_tax_type#, #i_tax_no#, #i_inv_prfx#, #i_inv_seq_no#, #i_crdr_prfx#, #i_crdr_seq_no#, #i_oi_ref_prfx#, #i_oi_ref_seq_no#, #i_oe_ref_prfx#, #i_oe_ref_seq_no#, #i_ai_ref_prfx#, #i_ai_ref_seq_no#, #i_ae_ref_prfx#, #i_ae_ref_seq_no#, #i_ae_awb_prfx#, #i_ae_awb_seq_no#, #i_oe_hbl_prfx#, #i_oe_hbl_seq_no#, #i_oe_bkg_prfx#, #i_oe_bkg_seq_no#, #i_ae_bkg_prfx#, #i_ae_bkg_seq_no#, #i_sea_quo_prfx#, #i_sea_quo_seq_no#, #i_air_quo_prfx#, #i_air_quo_seq_no#, #i_wh_rcpt_prfx#, #i_wh_rcpt_seq_no#,

sqlMap.update:
UPDATE tb_ofc SET CNT_CD = #i_cnt_cd#, OFC_ENG_NM = #i_ofc_eng_nm#, OFC_ZIP = #i_ofc_zip#, OFC_ADDR = #i_ofc_addr#, OFC_PHN = #i_ofc_phn#, OFC_FAX = #i_ofc_fax#, TRDP_CD = #i_trdp_cd#, PRNT_OFC_CD = #i_prnt_ofc_cd#, LOC_CD = #i_loc_cd#, DESCR = #i_descr#, USE_FLG = #i_use_flg#, FINC_OFC_CD = #i_finc_ofc_cd#, SLS_OFC_CD = #i_sls_ofc_cd#, MODI_USRID = #i_modi_usrid#, MODI_OFC_CD = #i_modi_ofc_cd#, DELT_FLG = #i_delt_flg#, TRF_CUR_CD = #i_trf_cur_cd#, STATE_CD = #i_state_cd#, OFC_LOCL_NM = #i_ofc_locl_nm#, OFC_EMAIL = #i_ofc_email#, OFC_URL = #i_ofc_url#, IATA_CD = #i_iata_cd#, FMC_NO = #i_fmc_no#, TAX_TYPE = #i_tax_type#, TAX_NO = #i_tax_no#,
AES_CNTC_NM = #i_aes_cntc_nm#, AES_CITY = #i_aes_city#, AES_STATE_CD = #i_aes_state_cd#, AES_ZIP = #i_aes_zip#, AES_CNT_CD = #i_aes_cnt_cd#, AES_RSPN_EMAIL = #i_aes_rspn_email#, AES_PRT_TYPE = #i_gl_agent_ai#, GL_AGENT_AE = #i_gl_agent_ae#, GL_RE_EARN = #i_gl_re_earn#, GL_EX_PROFIT = #i_gl_ex_profit#, GL_EX_LOSS = #i_gl_ex_loss#, GL_MISC_PROFIT = #i_gl_misc_profit#, GL_MISC_LOSS = #i_ai_ccn_seqno#, TSA_SEC_NO = #i_tsa_sec_no#, RVN_BANK_SEQ = #i_rvn_bank_seq#, COST_BANK_SEQ = #i_cost_bank_seq#, USE_HBL_SER = #i_use_hbl_ser#, OI_CGOR_PIC_INFO = #i_oi_cgor_pic_info#, AI_CGOR_PIC_INFO = #i_ai_cgor_pic_info#, CTF_USE_FLG = #i_ctf_use_flg#, CTF_PAYTO_TRDP_CD = #i_ctf_payto_trdp_cd#, CTF_CNTR20_RT = #i_ctf_cntr20_rt#, CTF_CNTR40_RT = #i_ctf_cntr40_rt#, CTF_CBM_RT = #i_ctf_cbm_rt#, CF_USE_FLG = #i_cf_use_flg#, CF_PAYTO_TRDP_CD = #i_cf_payto_trdp_cd#, CF_CNTR20_RT = #i_cf_cntr20_rt#, CF_CNTR40_RT = #i_cf_cntr40_rt#, CF_CBM_RT = #i_cf_cbm_rt#, MODI_TMS = GETUTCDATE() WHERE OFC_CD = #i_ofc_cd#

UPDATE tb_ofc SET MODI_USRID = #i_modi_usrid#, MODI_OFC_CD = #i_modi_ofc_cd#, DELT_FLG = #i_delt_flg#, INV_PRFX = #i_inv_prfx#, INV_SEQ_NO = #i_inv_seq_no#, CRDR_PRFX = #i_crdr_prfx#, CRDR_SEQ_NO = #i_crdr_seq_no#, OI_REF_PRFX = #i_oi_ref_prfx#, OI_REF_SEQ_NO = #i_oi_ref_seq_no#, OE_REF_PRFX = #i_oe_ref_prfx#, OE_REF_SEQ_NO = #i_oe_ref_seq_no#, AI_REF_PRFX = #i_ai_ref_prfx#, AI_REF_SEQ_NO = #i_ai_ref_seq_no#, AE_REF_PRFX = #i_ae_ref_prfx#, AE_REF_SEQ_NO = #i_ae_ref_seq_no#, AE_AWB_PRFX = #i_ae_awb_prfx#, AE_AWB_SEQ_NO = #i_ae_awb_seq_no#, OE_HBL_PRFX = #i_oe_hbl_prfx#, OE_HBL_SEQ_NO = #i_oe_hbl_seq_no#, OE_BKG_PRFX = #i_oe_bkg_prfx#, OE_BKG_SEQ_NO = #i_oe_bkg_seq_no#, AE_BKG_PRFX = #i_ae_bkg_prfx#, AE_BKG_SEQ_NO = #i_ae_bkg_seq_no#, SEA_QUO_PRFX = #i_sea_quo_prfx#, SEA_QUO_SEQ_NO = #i_sea_quo_seq_no#, AIR_QUO_PRFX = #i_air_quo_prfx#, AIR_QUO_SEQ_NO = #i_air_quo_seq_no#, WH_RCPT_PRFX = #i_wh_rcpt_prfx#, WH_RCPT_SEQ_NO = #i_wh_rcpt_seq_no#, WH_RCV_PRFX = #i_wh_rcv_prfx#, WH_RCV_SEQ_NO = #i_wh_rcv_seq_no#, WH_SHP_PRFX = #i_wh_shp_prfx#, WH_SHP_SEQ_NO = #i_wh_shp_seq_no#, TRK_PRFX = #i_trk_prfx#, TRK_SEQ_NO = #i_trk_seq_no#, WM_DOC_PRFX = #i_wm_doc_prfx#, WM_DOC_SEQ_NO = #i_wm_doc_seq_no#, MODI_TMS = GETUTCDATE() WHERE OFC_CD = #i_ofc_cd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ofc_cd FROM tb_ofc WHERE ofc_cd = #s_ofc_cd#
SELECT ofc_cd FROM tb_ofc WHERE trdp_cd = #s_trdp_cd# AND ofc_cd NOT IN (#s_ofc_cd#)

SELECT TOP $topCnt$ a.nod_cd, a.nod_eng_nm, a.nod_addr, a.use_flg, a.loc_cd, ( SELECT b.loc_nm FROM tb_loc b WHERE b.loc_cd = a.loc_cd AND b.delt_flg = 'N') AS loc_nm, a.nod_tp_desc, a.pic_nm, a.pic_phn, a.pic_fax, a.rgst_usrid, a.rgst_ofc_cd, a.rgst_tms, a.modi_usrid, a.modi_ofc_cd, a.modi_tms, a.delt_flg FROM tb_nod a
INNER JOIN ( SELECT nod_cd FROM tb_nod_tp_cd_list WHERE nod_tp_cd = #s_nod_tp_cd#) c ON a.nod_cd = c.nod_cd
WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.nod_eng_nm LIKE '%'+#s_nod_eng_nm#+'%'
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#
AND a.loc_cd = #s_loc_cd#
ORDER BY a.nod_cd ASC

SELECT COUNT(a.loc_cd) FROM tb_nod a
INNER JOIN ( SELECT nod_cd FROM tb_nod_tp_cd_list WHERE nod_tp_cd = #s_nod_tp_cd# ) c ON a.nod_cd = c.nod_cd
WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.nod_eng_nm LIKE '%'+#s_nod_eng_nm#+'%'
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#
AND a.loc_cd = #s_loc_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_nod ( nod_cd, nod_eng_nm, nod_addr, use_flg, loc_cd, nod_tp_desc, pic_nm, pic_phn, pic_fax, rgst_usrid, rgst_ofc_cd, rgst_tms, modi_usrid, modi_ofc_cd, modi_tms, delt_flg ) VALUES ( #i_nod_cd#, #i_nod_eng_nm#, #i_nod_addr#, #i_use_flg#, #i_loc_cd#, #i_nod_tp_desc#, #i_pic_nm#, #i_pic_phn#, #i_pic_fax#, #i_rgst_usrid#, #i_rgst_ofc_cd#, getdate(), #i_modi_usrid#, #i_modi_ofc_cd#, GETUTCDATE(), 'N' )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_nod SET nod_eng_nm = #i_nod_eng_nm#, loc_cd = #i_loc_cd#, nod_addr = #i_nod_addr#, pic_nm = #i_pic_nm#, pic_phn = #i_pic_phn#, pic_fax = #i_pic_fax#, use_flg = #i_use_flg#, nod_tp_desc= #i_nod_tp_desc#, modi_usrid = #i_modi_usrid#, modi_ofc_cd= #i_modi_ofc_cd#, modi_tms = GETUTCDATE() WHERE nod_cd = #i_nod_cd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT nod_cd FROM tb_nod WHERE nod_cd = #s_nod_cd#
SELECT nod_tp_cd AS com_cd FROM tb_nod_tp_cd_list WHERE nod_cd = #i_nod_cd#
SELECT COUNT(nod_tp_cd) FROM tb_nod_tp_cd_list WHERE nod_cd = #i_nod_cd#

SELECT a.ofc_cd, a.cnt_cd, (SELECT cnt_eng_nm FROM tb_cnt WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND use_flg ='Y' AND cnt_cd =a.cnt_cd) AS cnt_nm, a.ofc_eng_nm, a.ofc_zip, a.ofc_addr, a.ofc_phn, a.ofc_fax, a.trdp_cd, a.prnt_ofc_cd, (SELECT ofc_eng_nm FROM tb_ofc WHERE delt_flg='N' AND ofc_cd=a.prnt_ofc_cd) as prnt_ofc_nm, a.loc_cd, a.descr, a.use_flg, a.finc_ofc_cd, (SELECT ofc_eng_nm FROM tb_ofc WHERE delt_flg='N' AND ofc_cd=a.finc_ofc_cd) as finc_ofc_nm, a.sls_ofc_cd, (SELECT ofc_eng_nm FROM tb_ofc WHERE delt_flg='N' AND ofc_cd=a.sls_ofc_cd) as sls_ofc_nm, a.rgst_usrid, a.rgst_ofc_cd, a.rgst_tms, a.modi_usrid, a.modi_ofc_cd, a.modi_tms, a.delt_flg, a.trf_cur_cd, a.state_cd, (SELECT state_eng_nm FROM tb_state WHERE use_flg='Y' AND state_cd=a.state_cd AND cnt_cd =a.cnt_cd) as state_nm, a.ofc_locl_nm, a.ofc_email, a.ofc_url, a.iata_cd, a.fmc_no, a.tax_type, a.tax_no, a.inv_prfx, a.inv_seq_no, a.crdr_prfx, a.crdr_seq_no, a.oi_ref_prfx, a.oi_ref_seq_no, a.oe_ref_prfx, a.oe_ref_seq_no, a.ai_ref_prfx, a.ai_ref_seq_no, a.ae_ref_prfx, a.ae_ref_seq_no, a.ae_awb_prfx, a.ae_awb_seq_no, a.oe_hbl_prfx, a.oe_hbl_seq_no, a.oe_bkg_prfx, a.oe_bkg_seq_no, a.ae_bkg_prfx, a.ae_bkg_seq_no, a.ae_bkg_prfx, a.ae_bkg_seq_no, a.sea_quo_prfx, a.sea_quo_seq_no, a.air_quo_prfx, a.air_quo_seq_no, a.wh_rcpt_prfx, a.wh_rcpt_seq_no, a.trk_prfx, a.trk_seq_no, a.wm_doc_prfx, a.wm_doc_seq_no, a.aes_cntc_nm, a.aes_city, a.aes_state_cd, a.aes_zip, a.aes_cnt_cd, a.aes_rspn_email, a.aes_prt_type, a.it_next_no, a.it_end, a.oth_wgt_ut_cd, a.oth_meas_ut_cd, a.oth_size_ut_cd, a.gl_ar, a.gl_ap, a.gl_agent_ar, a.gl_agent_ap, a.gl_agent_oth, a.gl_agent_oi, a.gl_agent_oe, a.gl_agent_ai, a.gl_agent_ae, a.gl_re_earn, a.gl_ex_profit, a.gl_ex_loss, a.gl_misc_profit, a.gl_misc_loss, a.gl_agent_ps_oi, a.gl_agent_ps_oe, a.gl_agent_ps_ai, a.gl_agent_ps_ae, a.gl_agent_ps_oth, a.gl_vat_rev, a.gl_vat_cost, a.gl_vat_exp, a.inv_rmk, a.inv_font_size, a.inv_carr_rmk, a.inv_carr_font_size, a.crdr_rmk, a.crdr_font_size, a.locl_stmt_rmk, a.locl_stmt_font_size, a.agent_stmt_rmk, a.agent_stmt_font_size, a.do_rmk, a.do_font_size, a.ooh_bkg_rmk, a.ooh_bkg_font_size, a.awb_rmk, a.awb_font_size, a.pkup_rmk, a.pkup_font_size, a.quo_rmk, a.quo_font_size, a.oi_an_rmk, a.oi_an_font_size, a.oi_cgor_pic_info, a.oi_an_lcl_desc, a.oi_an_fcl_desc, a.sea_body, a.sea_lcl_desc, a.sea_fcl_desc, a.sea_cob, a.sea_mei, a.sea_msco, a.vsl_show_flg, a.load_port_show_flg, a.cntr_40hq_desc, a.cntr_45_desc, a.ai_an_rmk, a.ai_an_font_size, a.ai_cgor_pic_info, a.air_body, a.aem_hand_info, a.aeh_hand_info, a.dflt_an_memo, a.dock_rcpt_rmk, a.email_sign, a.oper1_flg, a.oper2_flg, a.oper3_flg, a.oper4_flg, a.oper5_flg, a.oper6_flg, a.oper7_flg, a.oper8_flg, a.oper9_flg, a.acc1_flg, a.acc2_flg, a.acc3_flg, a.acc4_flg, a.acc5_flg, a.acc6_flg, a.acc7_flg, a.acc8_flg, a.acc9_flg, a.post_dt_exp, a.post_dt_imp, a.post_dt_inv, a.post_dt_crdr, a.use_hbl_ser, a.pps_use_flg, a.ctf_use_flg, a.cf_use_flg FROM tb_ofc a WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.ofc_cd = #s_ofc_cd#
AND a.use_flg = 'Y'
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#

/*selectOFFICECODE_View*/ SELECT a.ofc_cd, a.cnt_cd, (SELECT cnt_eng_nm FROM tb_cnt WHERE delt_flg = 'N' AND use_flg ='Y' AND cnt_cd =a.cnt_cd) AS cnt_nm, a.ofc_eng_nm, a.ofc_zip, a.ofc_addr, a.ofc_phn, a.ofc_fax, a.trdp_cd, a.prnt_ofc_cd, (SELECT ofc_eng_nm FROM tb_ofc WHERE delt_flg='N' AND ofc_cd=a.prnt_ofc_cd) as prnt_ofc_nm, a.loc_cd, a.descr, a.use_flg, a.finc_ofc_cd, (SELECT ofc_eng_nm FROM tb_ofc WHERE delt_flg='N' AND ofc_cd=a.finc_ofc_cd) as finc_ofc_nm, a.sls_ofc_cd, (SELECT ofc_eng_nm FROM tb_ofc WHERE delt_flg='N' AND ofc_cd=a.sls_ofc_cd) as sls_ofc_nm, a.rgst_usrid, a.rgst_ofc_cd, a.rgst_tms, a.modi_usrid, a.modi_ofc_cd, a.modi_tms, a.delt_flg, a.trf_cur_cd, a.state_cd, (SELECT state_eng_nm FROM tb_state WHERE use_flg='Y' AND state_cd=a.state_cd AND cnt_cd =a.cnt_cd) as state_nm, a.ofc_locl_nm, a.ofc_email, a.ofc_url, a.iata_cd, a.fmc_no, a.tax_type, a.tax_no, a.inv_prfx, a.inv_seq_no, a.crdr_prfx, a.crdr_seq_no, a.oi_ref_prfx, a.oi_ref_seq_no, a.oe_ref_prfx, a.oe_ref_seq_no, a.ai_ref_prfx, a.ai_ref_seq_no, a.ae_ref_prfx, a.ae_ref_seq_no, a.ae_awb_prfx, a.ae_awb_seq_no, a.oe_hbl_prfx, a.oe_hbl_seq_no, a.oe_bkg_prfx, a.oe_bkg_seq_no, a.ae_bkg_prfx, a.ae_bkg_seq_no, a.ae_bkg_prfx, a.ae_bkg_seq_no, a.sea_quo_prfx, a.sea_quo_seq_no, a.air_quo_prfx, a.air_quo_seq_no, a.wh_rcpt_prfx, a.wh_rcpt_seq_no,
a.wh_rcv_prfx, a.wh_rcv_seq_no, a.wh_shp_prfx, a.wh_shp_seq_no,
a.trk_prfx, a.trk_seq_no, a.wm_doc_prfx, a.wm_doc_seq_no, a.aes_cntc_nm, a.aes_city, a.aes_state_cd, a.aes_zip, a.aes_cnt_cd, a.aes_rspn_email, a.aes_prt_type, a.it_next_no, a.it_end, a.oth_wgt_ut_cd, a.oth_meas_ut_cd, a.oth_size_ut_cd, a.gl_ar, a.gl_ap, a.gl_agent_ar, a.gl_agent_ap, a.gl_agent_oth, a.gl_agent_oi, a.gl_agent_oe, a.gl_agent_ai, a.gl_agent_ae, a.gl_re_earn, a.gl_ex_profit, a.gl_ex_loss, a.gl_misc_profit, a.gl_misc_loss, a.gl_agent_ps_oi, a.gl_agent_ps_oe, a.gl_agent_ps_ai, a.gl_agent_ps_ae, a.gl_agent_ps_oth, a.gl_vat_rev, a.gl_vat_cost, a.gl_vat_exp, a.inv_rmk, a.inv_font_size, a.inv_carr_rmk, a.inv_carr_font_size, a.crdr_rmk, a.crdr_font_size, a.locl_stmt_rmk, a.locl_stmt_font_size, a.agent_stmt_rmk, a.agent_stmt_font_size, a.do_rmk, a.do_font_size, a.ooh_bkg_rmk, a.ooh_bkg_font_size, a.awb_rmk, a.awb_font_size, a.pkup_rmk, a.pkup_font_size, a.quo_rmk, a.quo_font_size, a.oi_quo_rmk, a.oi_quo_font_size, a.oe_quo_rmk, a.oe_quo_font_size, a.ai_quo_rmk, a.ai_quo_font_size, a.ae_quo_rmk, a.ae_quo_font_size, a.wh_rct_rmk, a.wh_rct_font_size, a.oi_an_rmk, a.oi_an_font_size, a.oi_cgor_pic_info, a.oi_an_lcl_desc, a.oi_an_fcl_desc, a.sea_body, a.sea_lcl_desc, a.sea_fcl_desc, a.sea_cob, a.sea_mei, a.sea_msco, a.vsl_show_flg, a.load_port_show_flg, a.cntr_40hq_desc, a.cntr_45_desc, a.ai_an_rmk, a.ai_an_font_size, a.ai_cgor_pic_info, a.air_body, a.aem_hand_info, a.aeh_hand_info, a.dflt_an_memo, a.dock_rcpt_rmk, a.email_sign, a.oper1_flg, a.oper2_flg, a.oper3_flg, a.oper4_flg, a.oper5_flg, a.oper6_flg, a.oper7_flg, a.oper8_flg, a.oper9_flg, a.acc1_flg, a.acc2_flg, a.acc3_flg, a.acc4_flg, a.acc5_flg, a.acc6_flg, a.acc7_flg, a.acc8_flg, a.acc9_flg, a.post_dt_exp, a.post_dt_imp, a.post_dt_inv, a.pps_use_flg, a.pps_payto_trdp_cd, (SELECT locl_nm FROM tb_trdp WHERE delt_flg='N' AND trdp_cd= a.pps_payto_trdp_cd) as pps_payto_trdp_nm, CONVERT(FLOAT, a.pps_cntr20_rt) AS pps_cntr20_rt, CONVERT(FLOAT,a.pps_cntr40_rt) AS pps_cntr40_rt, CONVERT(FLOAT,a.pps_cbm_rt) AS pps_cbm_rt, a.post_dt_crdr, (SELECT value_1 FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE ofc_cd = a.ofc_cd AND set_type = 'CLOGO_1') AS logo_square, (SELECT value_1 FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE ofc_cd = a.ofc_cd AND set_type = 'CLOGO_2') AS logo_rectangle, (SELECT value_1 FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE ofc_cd = a.ofc_cd AND set_type = 'CLOGO_3') AS logo_sub, (SELECT value_2 FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE ofc_cd = a.ofc_cd AND set_type = 'OEM_PS') AS oem_pro_share, (SELECT value_2 FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE ofc_cd = a.ofc_cd AND set_type = 'OEH_PS') AS oeh_pro_share, (SELECT value_2 FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE ofc_cd = a.ofc_cd AND set_type = 'OIM_PS') AS oim_pro_share, (SELECT value_2 FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE ofc_cd = a.ofc_cd AND set_type = 'OIH_PS') AS oih_pro_share, (SELECT value_2 FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE ofc_cd = a.ofc_cd AND set_type = 'AEH_PS') AS aeh_pro_share, a.ofc_rep_nm, a.ccn_prfx, a.oi_ccn_seqno, a.ai_ccn_seqno, a.tsa_sec_no, a.rvn_bank_seq, a.cost_bank_seq, a.use_hbl_ser,
a.ctf_use_flg, a.ctf_payto_trdp_cd, (SELECT locl_nm FROM tb_trdp WHERE delt_flg='N' AND trdp_cd= a.ctf_payto_trdp_cd) as ctf_payto_trdp_nm, CONVERT(FLOAT, a.ctf_cntr20_rt) AS ctf_cntr20_rt, CONVERT(FLOAT,a.ctf_cntr40_rt) AS ctf_cntr40_rt, CONVERT(FLOAT,a.ctf_cbm_rt) AS ctf_cbm_rt, a.cf_use_flg, a.cf_payto_trdp_cd, (SELECT locl_nm FROM tb_trdp WHERE delt_flg='N' AND trdp_cd= a.cf_payto_trdp_cd) as cf_payto_trdp_nm, CONVERT(FLOAT, a.cf_cntr20_rt) AS cf_cntr20_rt, CONVERT(FLOAT,a.cf_cntr40_rt) AS cf_cntr40_rt, CONVERT(FLOAT,a.cf_cbm_rt) AS cf_cbm_rt FROM tb_ofc a WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.ofc_cd = #s_ofc_cd#
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#
SELECT set_type, value_1 AS logo_square FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE ofc_cd = #v_ofc_cd# AND set_type = #v_set_type#

SELECT a.ofc_cd,
a.inv_prfx, a.inv_seq_no + 1 AS inv_seq_no, a.crdr_prfx, a.crdr_seq_no + 1 AS crdr_seq_no, a.oi_ref_prfx, a.oi_ref_seq_no + 1 AS oi_ref_seq_no, a.oe_ref_prfx, a.oe_ref_seq_no + 1 AS oe_ref_seq_no, a.ai_ref_prfx, a.ai_ref_seq_no + 1 AS ai_ref_seq_no, a.ae_ref_prfx, a.ae_ref_seq_no + 1 AS ae_ref_seq_no, a.ae_awb_prfx, a.ae_awb_seq_no + 1 AS ae_awb_seq_no, a.oe_hbl_prfx, a.oe_hbl_seq_no + 1 AS oe_hbl_seq_no, a.oe_bkg_prfx, a.oe_bkg_seq_no + 1 AS oe_bkg_seq_no, a.sea_quo_prfx, a.sea_quo_seq_no + 1 AS sea_quo_seq_no, a.air_quo_prfx, a.air_quo_seq_no + 1 AS air_quo_seq_no, a.wh_rcpt_prfx, a.wh_rcpt_seq_no + 1 AS wh_rcpt_seq_no, a.trk_prfx, a.trk_seq_no + 1 AS trk_seq_no, a.wm_doc_prfx, a.wm_doc_seq_no + 1 AS wm_doc_seq_no, a.ae_bkg_prfx, a.ae_bkg_seq_no + 1 AS ae_bkg_seq_no FROM tb_ofc a WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.ofc_cd = #s_ofc_cd#
AND a.use_flg = #s_use_flg#

SELECT a.trdp_cd, a.oi_ref_prfx, a.oi_ref_seq_no + 1 AS oi_ref_seq_no, a.oe_ref_prfx, a.oe_ref_seq_no + 1 AS oe_ref_seq_no, a.ai_ref_prfx, a.ai_ref_seq_no + 1 AS ai_ref_seq_no, a.ae_ref_prfx, a.ae_ref_seq_no + 1 AS ae_ref_seq_no, a.ae_awb_prfx, a.ae_awb_seq_no + 1 AS ae_awb_seq_no, a.oe_hbl_prfx, a.oe_hbl_seq_no + 1 AS oe_hbl_seq_no FROM tb_trdp a WHERE a.delt_flg = 'N'
AND a.trdp_cd = #s_trdp_cd#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_OFC SET
inv_seq_no = #inv_seq_no#,
crdr_seq_no = #crdr_seq_no#,
oi_ref_seq_no = #oi_ref_seq_no#,
oe_ref_seq_no = #oe_ref_seq_no#,
ai_ref_seq_no = #ai_ref_seq_no#,
ae_ref_seq_no = #ae_ref_seq_no#,
ae_awb_seq_no = #ae_awb_seq_no#,
oe_hbl_seq_no = #oe_hbl_seq_no#,
oe_bkg_seq_no = #oe_bkg_seq_no#,
sea_quo_seq_no = #sea_quo_seq_no#,
air_quo_seq_no = #air_quo_seq_no#,
wh_rcpt_seq_no = #wh_rcpt_seq_no#,
trk_seq_no = #trk_seq_no#,
ae_bkg_seq_no = #ae_bkg_seq_no#,
wm_doc_seq_no = #wm_doc_seq_no#,
ofc_cd = #s_ofc_cd# WHERE 1=1
AND ofc_cd = #s_ofc_cd#
AND use_flg = #s_use_flg#

UPDATE TB_TRDP SET
oi_ref_seq_no = #oi_ref_seq_no#
oe_ref_seq_no = #oe_ref_seq_no#
ai_ref_seq_no = #ai_ref_seq_no#
ae_ref_seq_no = #ae_ref_seq_no#
ae_awb_seq_no = #ae_awb_seq_no#
oe_hbl_seq_no = #oe_hbl_seq_no#
WHERE 1=1
AND trdp_cd = #s_trdp_cd#
sqlMap.select: select value_2 from TB_OFC_SETTINGS where ofc_cd = #s_ofc_cd# and set_type = 'CLOGO_1'
SELECT COUNT(VALUE_2) FROM TB_OFC_SETTINGS WHERE OFC_CD = #i_ofc_cd# AND SET_TYPE = #set_type#
